## let's make some aRt! {.center}

## some guiding principles

::: incremental
1. start simple and iterate

2. be mindful of your process (don't rush)

3. have fun / don't overthink it

4. share the results!
:::

## exercise 1

Create a piece of generative aRt that satisfies these conditions:

- has 5 points / shapes
- each has a different colour and size
- has 1 line
